message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.  Given its unique features and quality, I'm offering it at $20,000.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something we can work with.

Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This reflects the value it would bring you while still acknowledging its worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still not able to meet at $17,000. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. Let me know if this is feasible.
